price: Aí, cada alma estará ciente do que adiantou. E todos serão levados a Allah, seu Verdadeiro Protetor; e o que eles forjavam sumirá, para longe deles.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ تَبۡلُواْ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّآ أَسۡلَفَتۡۚ وَرُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: hunālika tablū kullu nafsin mā aslafat waruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
